description: Emily is the daughter of Douglas Starr, a poor journalist, and Juliet Murray, a woman from an elitist family who would not allow her to marry Douglas and rejected her when the two eloped. Juliet died when Emily was four and her father dies of consumption at the beginning of the series when Emily is ten. Emily is then taken in by her mother`s family and moves to New Moon, her mother`s family`s ancestral home, in nearby Blair Water.
name: Emily Byrd Starr
